SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Class that represents the gaming board
BoardMask
Represents a board mask that stores information about available tiles for different numbers of players.
BoardMaskParser
Parses a JSON file containing board mask configurations and provides access to the parsed BoardMask object.
BoardMessage
Message that contains information about the board in a turn
BoardResponse
The BoardResponse class represents a response containing the game board information.
CardCommonTarget
class that represents the type of common Target based on the number of players
CardPersonalTarget
class (record) that contains personal card information
CardsResponse
The CardsResponse class represents a response containing the available cards information.
ChatMessage
The ChatMessage class represents a chat message in the game.
Cli
this class represents a command-line interface (CLI) for the game client.
Client
The Client class represents a client in the client-server communication model.
ClientListener
The ClientListener interface defines methods for handling responses received from the server.
ClientManager
The class ClientManager serves as a base class for managing the client-side functionality.
ClientSetup
The ClientSetup class is the entry point of the client application.
ClientUpdate
The ClientUpdate class is responsible for continuously updating the client with incoming messages.
ClientUpdateListener
The ClientUpdateListener interface provides a callback method to handle incoming messages during client updates.
CloseMessage
The CloseMessage class represents a message indicating the closure of a game.
ColorCodes
The ColorCodes class provides static methods to retrieve ANSI color codes for different colors.
ColourTile
 
CommonDeck
 
CommonList
Enum for distinguish the common goal cards, used by Utils to generate the corresponding card
CommunicationProtocol
The CommunicationProtocol interface defines the methods for communication between client and server.
Connection
The Connection interface represents a connection between a client and a server.
ConnectionSceneController
Controller that manages the waiting scene, where the players wait that the game starts
Coordinates
Class for a pair of Integer that represents the coordinates of a Tile in the library or on the board
DisconnectionMessage
The DisconnectionMessage class represents a disconnection message in the game.
EmptySlotException
Exception thrown when a selected slot is empty
EndGameException
 
EndGameToken
Token given to the player who first finishes filling the library
EndMessage
The EndMessage class represents a message indicating the end of a game.
ErrorMessage
The ErrorMessage class represents an error message.
FirstConnectionSceneController
Controller that manages the connection of the first player of every game
FirstResponse
The FirstResponse class represents the first response in the game.
Game
class that manage the logic of the game, receiving messages from the controller to evolve the game
GameAlreadyStarted
exception thrown if game is already started
GameController
Class that Manages a Game
GameException
 
GameNotReadyException
 
GameSceneController
Controller that manages the Game scene in all aspects
GameState
enumeration showing the state of the game
Gui
Class for starting the Graphical User Interface, made with JavaFX
GuiMaster
Class that manages the Messages sent to the client,using the according method of the controllers
InitResponse
The InitResponse class represents the initial response in the game.
InvalidPositionsException
Exception thrown when position selected is not valid
InvalidSlotException
Exception thrown when a selected slot is not valid
Launcher
 
LoginMessage
The LoginMessage class represents a login message in the game.
LoginResponse
The LoginResponse class represents a login response in the game.
LoginSceneController
Controller that manages the login of the player
MasterController
Class that manage the multiInstance of Games on the same server.
MaxPlayerException
Exception thrown when num of players is more than four
Message
Superclass of all the messages exchanged between the client and the server
MyServer
Class that represents the server, handles the messages incoming from the client and sends messages to the clients
MyShelfiePrintStream
The MyShelfiePrintStream class extends the PrintStream class and provides custom functionality for printing.
NoSpaceInColumnException
Exception thrown if there is not enough space for the selected numbers of tiles
PersonalCardTile
 
PersonalDeck
 
PersonalParser
Represents a PersonalParser that handles the serialization and deserialization of Personal Cards.
PingMessage
The `PingMessage` class represents a "ping" message that extends the `Message` class.
Player
Class that represent the Player
PreLoginMessage
The PreLoginMessage class represents a pre-login message in the game.
PreLoginResponse
The PreLoginResponse class represents a pre-login response in the game.
ReFirstResponse
The ReFirstResponse class represents a response to the first response in the game.
RemoveMessage
The RemoveMessage class represents a message for removing positions in the game.
RemoveResponse
The RemoveResponse class represents a response to the remove message in the game.
RMICommunicationProtocol
The RMICommunicationProtocol class represents an implementation of the CommunicationProtocol interface using the RMI (Remote Method Invocation) protocol for communication between the client and server.
RMIConnect
The RMIConnect class represents a connection implementation for the RMI protocol.
ScoringToken
 
ServerImpl
ServerImpl class is an implementation of the RemoteController interface.
ServerInterface
The ServerInterface interface defines the methods that a remote server should implement.
SetMessage
The SetMessage class represents a message for setting the maximum number of players in the game.
SetResponse
The SetResponse class represents a response to the set message in the game.
Shelf
class that represents player's shelf
SoldOutTilesException
Exception thrown when there are no more tiles in TileDeck
TCPCommunicationProtocol
The TCPCommunicationProtocol class represents a communication protocol using TCP for remote communication.
TCPConnect
Represents a TCP connection implementation of the Connection interface.
Tile
 
TileDeck
 
TileSlot
Class that abstracts the concept of a Slot on the board
TurnMessage
The TurnMessage class represents a message for a player's turn in the game.
TurnResponse
The TurnResponse class represents a response to a player's turn in the game.
UIDResponse
The UIDResponse class represents a response containing a unique identifier (UID) in the game.
UsernameError
The UsernameError class represents an error related to a username in the game.
UsernameException
exception thrown if username is not valid or already taken
Utils
 
WakeMessage
The WakeMessage class represents a wake-up message in the game.
